scripts.build: npm run clean&& npx parcel build src/index.html -d app --no-content-hash --detailed-report --no-minify --public-url './' && npm run copy
scripts.start: mkdir -p dist app  && npm run copy &&  cp app/*.worker.js dist && npx parcel start --no-hmr --open --no-source-maps --no-autoinstall src/index.html
scripts.lint: npm run organizeImports && npm run format
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.build-push: npm run build &&  git commit -a -m fb && git push
